The book contains a preface by George R.R. Martin and a foreword by David Benioff and D.B. Weiss, in which they are quizzed by Bryan Cogman. The book is then divided into five sections, each with sub-sections dealing with aspects of the production.

==Collector's Edition==

The Collector's Edition pack includes a second book: ''The Storyboards'', containing storyboard sequences drawn by [[Will Simpson]]. The Storyboard book is also 192 pages long.<ref>[http://www.geekalerts.com/inside-hbos-game-of-thrones-collectors-edition/ ]</ref>
